_header: For all the blood I shed for thee
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 411.
Subjects: Christ, blood of; devotional verse; illustrations, verse accompanying; Christ, wounds of; crucifixion
_description: A couplet in a scroll attached to a drawing of the wound in Christ’s heart

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
ffor all þe blod I sched for þebot hertely luffe I aske to
                    me
BodLatMisC66.Note:
Written in scroll above heart illustrating the wounds Christ received on
                    the cross.
